Posts by "Green Party Admin"
Green Party Admin
Welcome to our new website
6 February 2019
by
Green Party Admin
Read more »
To top

The Green Party is growing fast. We now represent people in Westminster and in a record number of local councils, as well as in the London Assembly.
In Neath Port Talbot we recently elected our first Green Councillor adding that much needed voice to the Council chamber to address the critical issues that the older parties are not even discussing. We are a growing force in Neath Port Talbot and welcome new members to help us make positive change in local government.
We’re working progressively on local issues; to improve the lives of all people in NPT, and to improve our local environment. As part of the Green Party of England & Wales, we share a deep concern for social and environmental justice, expressed through our national policies, we believe fair is worth fighting for.
We rely on people power rather than corporate finance in all that we do. Get involved with us today so that we can achieve so much more for NPT.
The Green Party Political Programme sets out what Greens are in politics to do: to end the system that keeps hurting the environment and all of us who rely on it – and to build a better alternative.
This Programme isn’t like other parties’ manifestos, it has not been squeezed through focus groups and stripped down according to the latest polling. Instead it has been built from policies proposed and voted on by our members, looking to secure the long term future of the places and people they love.
It’s a vision of a better world, and together we can deliver it.
